data.message: Hi FB! I am blocked from sending messages to people who aren't my friends on here 🙂 I'm a healthcare recruiter and use FB to contact people who express interest on fb groups we pay to be members of. What can I do to fix this?

replies.message: Hey Taylor. Thanks for reaching out. You may have been blocked because you used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. For example, sending a large amount of messages in a short period of time could result in a block. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2hkcO71. If you believe you were blocked by mistake, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2m2vN7S. -Elizabeth
